extendedInfo.description: Smart Connect (LiveWareâ¢ Manager) allows you to decide what happens when you connect your smartphone to another device. Smart Connect is provided from Android 4.0 Important notice!Users running earlier versions of Android will be advised to use LiveWareâ¢ manager and will not be able to install Smart Connect on their smartphones unless they upgrade their phone software to Android 4.0 (Ice Cream Sandwich).LiveWareâ¢ Manager (Available prior to Android 4.0)Manage devicesManage smart accessories like SmartWatch or Smart wireless headset pro. Downloads any needed applications and finds third party applications when availableSmart Connect (Available from Android 4.0)Manage devicesManage smart accessories like SmartWatch, Smart wireless headset pro or SmartTags. Downloads any needed applications and finds third party applications when availableIntroduces events Create events based on device, time and actions. For instance connecting a headset, launching the music player and playing music while at home. A rich set of preconfigured events available from start.

reviews.comment: Excellence update, thanks !!!

reviews.title: Update with
reviews.comment: It not automatically showing the connectivity if we connect any headset or USB If u update with automatic connection I will give 5 star rating
reviews.author: siva charan charan

reviews.title: Need fix
reviews.comment: It take long time to activate the task sometime Don turn on. I using xperia s. What should I do?  any update?  Its a great app though..
reviews.author: Sivanathan Arumagam

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: This app makes your life so much easier when it comes to connecting it to other peripheral devices (smart tags, smart watch, hdmi device etc.)
reviews.author: Ricardo Rose

reviews.title: usefull app
reviews.comment: it would be great if i can add a condition like don\'t start walkman if i am using movie app.
reviews.author: Kanathip Santayanon

reviews.title: Not working
reviews.comment: Am not able to install the app it is showing package file invalid..pls fix it..earlier I had this app I have uninstalled by mistake...I need this app very much..pls help me...
reviews.author: Susmithasree Srirama

reviews.title: Gr8 app to make a fone a bot.. Still with bugs
reviews.comment: I really like the functionality ans the device support Especially the conditions that you can keep with the device  I wish the auto sync setting to be included  And few more options too especially in conditions  Time condition linked with my tag automatically triggers even if I don\'t use my tag, at the end Event..... Fix needed  Autosync function also please...   Sony full of bugs :-(  On my SBH20 I set it to Bluetooth off after disconnection, which never has worked manually have to disable it :\'(
reviews.author: Martin Ambre

reviews.title: Hate it!
reviews.comment: I simply hate this application and I cannot uninstall it! That maskes me seriously think of changing to iPhone!
reviews.author: Andrea Dana

reviews.title: Easy like breezy
reviews.comment: I love this app. Just plug in my headphones and magically opens my musics player and plays my favorite music
reviews.author: Xiao Bei

reviews.comment: Unable to update from LiveWare to Smart Connect. Note:Device on Android 4.0\tI had Smart Connect previously on my device but I had to reset the phone, After reset I have been trying to update it but it always fail giving error \"Package file was not signed correctly.\" Uninstall the previous copy of the app and try again\" :( As the device is of Sony and the app in the device is marked as System App I can\'t uninstall it. Somebody, please suggest me some steps to solve my problem.
reviews.author: Syed Danish Aalam

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: But a few issues, being able to use both time and location and device at the same time would be useful. As would a car preset, since I use my phone my media player, and rarely with headphones, the device suddenly turning the volume down because \"it\'s bad for my hearing\" is annoying
reviews.author: J Heyes

reviews.title: Not liking the new look...
reviews.comment: The new GUI is too confusing and over decorated.  I want a program that\'s easy too understand and use! Not something pretty and confusing.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Brilliant! Love the improvements, only Bluetooth does not work yet.
reviews.comment: This app is probably the most useful app out there, great work. Like the new update, but the Bluetooth still doesn\'t turn of/switch after disconnecting Bluetooth headphones. Could you try and fix that? Has been an issue for a long time now.
reviews.author: Mark Tauber

reviews.comment: Very useful after the update to Smart Connect
reviews.author: Mia HGD

reviews.title: GPS ON/OFF
reviews.comment: Add more actions for smart tags please, such as GPS ON/OFF, or ability to start more then one app.

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Would be 5 stars if it had the ability to have an initializer as battery %,  I.E at 35% initialize power saving.

reviews.title: Almost perfect
reviews.comment: Excellent job but insert Greek please...
